Package tasklist

Class TaskList

  • java.lang.Object
    • tasklist.TaskList
  • public class TaskList
extends java.lang.Object
    The `TaskList` class represents a collection of tasks in the BloopBot application. It provides methods to manipulate the task list, such as adding, deleting, marking, and displaying tasks.
    Version:
    0.0.0
    Author:
    raydenlim

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TaskList()
      Constructs a new `TaskList` object with an empty list of tasks.

      • TaskList

    • Method Detail

      • addTask

        public java.lang.String addTask​(Task taskDesc)
        Adds a task to the task list.
        Parameters:
        taskDesc - The task to be added.
        Returns:
        A message indicating the result of the add operation.

      • displayTasks

        public java.lang.String displayTasks()
        Displays the tasks in the task list. If the list is empty, a message indicating no tasks are present is displayed.
        Returns:
        A formatted string containing the task list or a message indicating no tasks.

      • deleteTask

        public Task deleteTask​(int taskNum)
                throws DukeException
        Deletes a task from the task list.
        Parameters:
        taskNum - The index of the task to be deleted.
        Returns:
        The deleted task.
        Throws:
        DukeException - If the task index is invalid.

      • getTasks

        public java.util.ArrayList<Task> getTasks()
        Retrieves the list of tasks.
        Returns:
        The list of tasks.

      • getTaskCount

        public int getTaskCount()
        Retrieves the number of tasks in the task list.
        Returns:
        The number of tasks in the task list.

      • findTasks

        public java.util.ArrayList<Task> findTasks​(java.lang.String keyword)
        Finds and returns a list of tasks that contain the specified keyword in their descriptions.
        Parameters:
        keyword - The keyword to search for in task descriptions.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of tasks that match the keyword.

      • calculateStatistics

        public Statistics calculateStatistics()
        Calculates and returns task statistics based on the tasks in the associated `TaskList`. This method calculates the following statistics: - The number of tasks completed within the last week. - The total number of tasks completed. - The total number of tasks in the `TaskList`. - The percentage of tasks completed within the last week. - The percentage of total tasks completed.
        Returns:
        A `Statistics` object containing the calculated task statistics.
